sect1.title: ldelim,rdelim
sect1.para: ldelim and rdelim are used for displaying the literal delimiter, in our case "{" or "}". The template engine always tries to interpret delimiters, so this is the way around that.

example.title: ldelim, rdelim
example.programlisting:
{* this will print literal delimiters out of the template *}
{ldelim}funcname{rdelim} is how functions look in Smarty!
OUTPUT:
{funcname} is how functions look in Smarty!
